title: HP Spectre x360 (2022): Release date, price, and everything you need to know
content:
It’s been over a year and a half since HP introduced its last generation of the Spectre family of laptops, but it’s finally time for an upgrade. The 2022 HP Spectre x360 family is here, and it’s leaving behind the two models that have been around the longest. This year, we’re getting the HP Spectre

The post HP Spectre x360 (2022): Release date, price, and everything you need to know appeared first on XDA.
description: HP's latest premium Spectre x360 laptops are now available, featuring 12th-generation Intel processors and more. Here's everything we know.
